name: Tale Of Otrym
description:
Action-RPG game that has the essence of Zelda. Primarily made to develop my programming skills, project will likely be fully released in the next couple years. 

Controls:

W/Arrow up key - Move Up

S/Arrow down key - Move Down

D/Arrow right key - Move Right

A/Arrow left key - Move Left

Escape key - brings up Menu

Space key - Used to interact with objects, as the key to start the game, and action slot one.

Shift key - Action slot two

"i" key - Saves Progress

Programming/Art - Tyler Will

Programming/Art/Sounds - Benjamin Anderson
